attributes.action:
Honour our lost loved ones from covid19 with a memorial day 
#loveforthelost
attributes.additional_details:
I lost my mum to covid19 on the 23rd April 2020 . 
If my mum had gotten ill from covid19 around now in the pandemic instead of the start there is a greater chance she would have survived.  
My mum like everyone who has been lost deserves to be remembered from this pandemic.  #loveforthelost  supporting everyone whos been effected from this virus.
attributes.background:
let us set a memorial day/date for people of the UK to honor and remember all the loved ones we have lost to covid19. 
They deserve to be remembered from this pandemic .

rejection.details:
We're sorry to hear of the death of your mother. Please accept our condolences.

We think this petition is very similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/311923
